website_summaries.verdict: This hardshell case works well for those wanting a protective cover for their American Mahjong set.
pros: Mahjong set enclosed in an aluminum case for supreme protection
Case includes a handle for easy portability
cons: Some customers had problems with the set arriving damaged from shipping

customer_reviews.title: The case is weak for the weight of the contents.
customer_reviews.text: After having it for 4 days, the case cracked open badly. The case is not strong enough to hold the heavy weight of its contents. Considering how much this cost I'm not too happy about this happening. The mahjong contents themselves are OK, I have seen nicer quality. Thus a 3-star review.
customer_reviews.author: M Burns

customer_reviews.title: Great value for complete set!
customer_reviews.text: This is the same Mahjong set used on Holland America cruises where I learned the basics of the game. It can be used for American and at least some Chinese Mahjong games. The set is complete and the parts are well made. Having a hard case protects the contents, but some people might want a soft case which would weigh less. The price is great for the set with case - a good value compared to other other options.
customer_reviews.author: AZ RVer

customer_reviews.title: Spend the money for a nicer set.
customer_reviews.text: Agree with others that the packaging is lousy and we are still picking off cellophane. The tips needed needle nosed pliers and there were no instructions on how to assemble. I had played before, but a novice might not know. Don't understand the flowers. I thought there were only 8 flowers. Also tiles seem small compared to what I play with. Next time I'd spend more money.
customer_reviews.author: Trixie

customer_reviews.title: Great set, best value that I've found
customer_reviews.text: Best value for the money that I've found. Sometimes it's the little things that make the difference. For me it was the clear plastic caps that fit over each tile box. Other sets in this price range did not have them.
customer_reviews.author: El syd

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: This mahjong set is excellent because you can use it to play either the Chinese game or the Western game, due to the inclusion of Jokers! The pushers (or helping hands) are very convenient to "curtsey" the wall. The instrustions are very clear, so beginner's will be able to play right away.
customer_reviews.author: backinaus

customer_reviews.title: Learn this game - it's fun!
customer_reviews.text: Husband chose wisely after much studying of packages available for purchase. Case it big enough to hold everything nicely, even if not put away quite right. We did add some self-stick cushions to keep the metal case from scratching furniture, floors.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set but instructions need to be better
customer_reviews.text: The set is beautiful, sturdy and you could definitely give as a gift. My only complaint is the instruction book. The print is extremely light so it is hard to read and you really can't see the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Dolphingirl

customer_reviews.title: I like that the set arrived quickly but the plastic pushers ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that the set arrived quickly but the plastic pushers were cracked and broken and they are lightweight plastic. Soooo cheap. They hardly move.
customer_reviews.author: marsha graser

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!  Everything I expected!
customer_reviews.text: This set is just what I expected based on reviews that I had read about this product! Do not expect to use the instruction manual included with the set to learn how to play Mah Jong as it will not make sense. The tiles, racks and pushers are great! Set includes trays with clear covers for the tiles and the included dice are a good size. The storage case is well made and I have already purchased a second set for a friend and recommended this set to others who play in my Mah Jong group! Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Judie Gilsig

customer_reviews.title: Missing  '6 circles' tiles
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this set and it is missing the '6 circles' tiles (all 4) and received a double pair of '7 circles'. The set looks nice, but with missing tiles I can't use the set.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kirk

customer_reviews.title: You will need to watch youtube to figure out how to play
customer_reviews.text: Pieces were perfect and well made. The instructions were a bit confusing so we had to watch some youtube videos. Love the hard case the game came in.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to play Mahjong. No other purchase necessary. Tiles are bright and easy to read. Excellent, sturdy case. Pieces fit in cases with covers. All parts of the set fit well in the case. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: pomeranians

customer_reviews.title: It is a mahjong set and only thing was a small dent in the case but other than that it was fine when delivered
customer_reviews.text: Have started playing Mahjong again after a 40 years ??? hiatus. Couldn't begin to know where my old set was so ordered this one. It is a mahjong set and only thing was a small dent in the case but other than that it was fine when delivered. Like that everything is included in it.
customer_reviews.author: Carsok

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase.  Fun game.
customer_reviews.text: The game was brand new as promised. It was delivered early. The quality of the product tiles, racks, and pushers is very good. When viewing the product on line, I was able to enlarge the product picture and got an accurate view of what I was buying. The tiles are standard. The jokers show that they are not finished in gold, but rather green. So that was acceptable. The description included the extra tiles that you would expect to get. Overall I'm very pleased and I would do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Crackers

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality set for the price. It comes with full size dice and 4 pushers, which many sets don't have. The hard case protects everything well and is easy to carry. Everything you need to play Mah Jongg is here.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Living

customer_reviews.title: Complete Mah Jong Set
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this Mah Jong set. The pushers are well made and the tiles have the seasons written on them for easy attention. The price is good and it shipped to me quickly and within a week I was up and playing. The dice included with the set are tiny, but easy to exchange out with larger ones from the dollar store. This is a wonderful set for a beginner who will use these pieces for years. The case is made well of aluminum with no sharp edges. I can carry this easily and all pieces stay snuggly in place. I absolutely love my Mah Jong set.
customer_reviews.author: OcalaRose

customer_reviews.title: Need to have better instructions and the trays do not fit inside the ...
customer_reviews.text: Too complicated to learn. Need to have better instructions and the trays do not fit inside the case, hard to store.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: The game and all of its pieces are excellent. There was a small dent in the case ...
customer_reviews.text: The product came on time and all the parts were there. The game and all of its pieces are excellent. There was a small dent in the case but I chose not to send it back, as it will not damage the game. It is just not as nice visually.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: This is a set "with" pushers but the pushers are ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a set "with" pushers but the pushers are clearly an add-on and not designed as part of the set. The pins have a plastic cap that have to be removed because they are really for the tokens, not the pushers. I've seen sets where the pushers are correctly designed to go with the racks. This is not one of them
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used set sold as new
customer_reviews.text: Positive-Set received on time, quality was OK but in a cheep spectrum Negative-case damaged on one side and all the items inside were previously ripped open and used, little zip bags were stapled back together, instruction book was bent and slightly worn out plastic sleeve covers were missing from 2 pushers-
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product
customer_reviews.text: It looks just like the more expensive Mahjong sets at our clubhouse, and performs just as well.
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read tiles, nice set.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the components in this set. White background tiles are easy to read and embossing of characters on tile face is quite decent. The set includes "extras" if you lose one or the dog gets it and thinks it's a cookie. You can't go wrong with this convenient to carry set. It's a quality, practical set--not a collector's item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love This Set
customer_reviews.text: This set arrived in two days. All parts and pieces were undamaged. Case is a bit heavy, but it protects the set well.
customer_reviews.author: aksquirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice set but pushers need some work
customer_reviews.text: The MahJongg set is very nice but the pushers need some work. They don't work smoothly & the black protective tips fall off all the time.
customer_reviews.author: kbg

customer_reviews.title: Playing every Friday
customer_reviews.text: I play Mahjong every Friday with a group of about 20 women here in Colorado. Many of them have Mahjong sets. Some of them have this one, some have antique ones from Asia, and some have others from various sites that sell them. This one is excellent. The case isn't heavy, but it's sturdy and it comes complete with tiles and pushers -- a must if you play. The price is very good for the quality and content.
customer_reviews.author: Inlovewithamazon

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great value! The set is high quality and the tiles are easy to read. Love this came with pushers. The case isn't quite as strong as I'd like, but if you aren't rough with it, it should last.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the speedy response to replace one item in my set that was damaged in shipping. The set looks great and I am ready to play mah jongg.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Ross

customer_reviews.title: Play Mahjong?
customer_reviews.text: Love this Mahjong set! So complete - comes with extra tiles, pushers chips, etc. Nice white tiles and a large enough case so you don't have to struggle to get everything in. One very minor fault -- the dice are tiny. I replaced them with larger ones and the set became perfect. I've had several compliments on this set and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lorac07

customer_reviews.title: This is all my mom wanted for Christmas.
customer_reviews.text: She was thrilled to get it. Now she can host Mahjong night at their house.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg

customer_reviews.title: I liked how all items fit in the case
customer_reviews.text: I liked how all items fit in the case. I liked the sturdy case. All materials were excellent quality for use.
customer_reviews.author: IJH

customer_reviews.title: Great Mahjong set
customer_reviews.text: Great Mahjong set. Love the case. The tiles are beautifully made and no imperfections. This is a great set for anyone looking for a Mahjong tiles et.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely superb.
customer_reviews.text: This set is way beyond what I expected. It is excellent. Great instructions, also. Some folks had negative reviews -- not sure if they were reviewing correct item, or if the dealer has improved over time. Whoever said the dice were too small, that's they way they come. If you want bigger dice, they are easily available throughout the free world.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Oksol

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this set and Amazon offers a great price for it. Tiles are standard size, well-colored and sturdy. Case is nice and easy to pack after games. Very nice to have pushers attached to the tile holders. Highly recommend this American Mah Jong set.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: I received an excellent complete making set
customer_reviews.text: I received an excellent complete making set. The case is hard sided making very easy to transport. Complete set can be used for either Hong Kong making or American making.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set - good quality and case is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda M. Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: Mah Jongg Set w/Pushers
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set, happy to have everything fit in one box. Plan to give as a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: FayKer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect; has everything you need all in one set.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom after extensive research. She is a beginner who plays weekly and wanted a set of her own,. This has everything she needs. We chose it together, it was shipped to her home with lightning speed. She is thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Guzzino

customer_reviews.title: Mah Jogg Set in Aluminum Case
customer_reviews.text: Except for the dinky little dice included in the set, of which there were 3, one large one would have been great, this is a well made Mah Jogg set. The tiles have a nice feel, the bars work smoothly and the case is fine. The book is not exactly the rules my club plays but the set and case is very satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: irenenaoum

customer_reviews.title: A great set
customer_reviews.text: This Mahjong set is complete with all tiles needed to play either Chinese or American Mahjong. It comes with racks, pushers, dice and chips. When I take the set to my weekly Mahjong games, I get a lot of compliments on value. I took one star off for two reasons, the tiles are somewhat smaller than some other sets I have seen. Also, the dice are ridiculously small, I had to substitute them.
customer_reviews.author: Magyargirl

customer_reviews.title: The case was fine, but One of the pushers was cracked and ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the set packed in a large box with little packing material. Description said that the case might have some dents. The case was fine , but One of the pushers was cracked and in 2 pieces. One of the racks was cracked and in 2 pieces. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mahjong set
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Mahjong set that can be used for American Mahjong and Asian Mahjong. The tiles are easy to read. The set comes with 4 pushers and carrying case. A great set for the money! I have already recommended it to a friend, who also purchased this item
customer_reviews.author: Ann F

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect. The case is sturdy aluminum and holds everything easily and keeps it organized. I like that the pushers fit into the case easily without having to take them apart first. The price was very good for a complete set with nothing else to purchase except the Mahjong card.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: This set is well worth the price! Loved that it comes with pushers that fit in the case and covers for the tile holders.My friends bought similar sets that cost twice the price and one didn't have pushers or covers!I would definitely recommend buying this set!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: My Michigan native "snowbird" mom plays this game with her old fart buddies in Florida at an RV park. She loves this game and said this set is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Quiet7

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to the game of Mah Jongg, so didn't want to make a big investment in my first set, which would primarily be used for me to practice. The product came as advertised and is nice enough to use for games, not just practice. The dice are useable, but pretty small, so you may consider buying larger ones. Other than that, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Panchi

customer_reviews.title: Case too heavy for carrying when it is packed. ...
customer_reviews.text: Case too heavy for carrying when it is packed. Have to carry the racks and pushers separately as they do not fit in the case.. Considering purchasing a set, get one with the soft case which holds everything..
customer_reviews.author: LCH

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered in perfect condition and much better than expected. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L. Sandler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent All The Way Around !!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted. Excellent product, excellent price !!!
customer_reviews.author: Loves To Read

customer_reviews.title: New Mah Jongg Player
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to take with me on a cruise to learn how to play with a friend. We never opened the case until last week. This is a premium set that travels well. The ladies loved it and I had my first lesson. I am now hooked and looking forward to playing often.
customer_reviews.author: COOKIE

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Covers for tile boxes are included. Everything is as expected. Good quality case
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game feedback
customer_reviews.text: Game arrived in tact and in excellent condition- well-packed for shipping. What I don't understand right now is when I just went to order another set for $80 that I cannot use my 'Prime' account for free-shipping. When I bought the set in April, 2014, I could. What changed? I would like to order another, but won't if I cannot use my 'Prime' account. Thoughts?
customer_reviews.author: L. Kozimor

customer_reviews.title: Great set. Easy-to-Read tiles.
customer_reviews.text: I'm really pleased with my set in all ways except covers of tile boxes. Flimsy plastic. Maybe they are "throw aways"??? But, I recommended the set to a friend and would again. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline M. Feil

customer_reviews.title: This is great! The exact same set my friend bought for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great! The exact same set my friend bought for much more money. The pushers are clear plastic. They don't match the trays, but they work fine. A great find! Very happy with the set and the service.
customer_reviews.author: Buttered Popcorn

customer_reviews.title: Nice, functional set with 'standard' size tiles
customer_reviews.text: Nice set with the most common size tiles (29.9mm x 22mm x 13.1mm [where 25.4mm=1"]). Everything functions well once you figure out how to remove one of the black plastic covers from each tile tray (temporarily) to install its clear plastic pusher arm. If you are just learning, get these two books (in order):  and then  The first book comes with playing cards for tiles which are great for travel and for practicing how to develop hands via the Charlston(s), etc. The included instruction book is not very worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE my Mahjong set
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE my Mahjong set. I had looked for a long time. The case is good quality as are the tiles and pushers. The book that it comes with is helpful, though I did purchase another book that I think has more to offer. The tiles have a nice weight and clear markings. I really do love this set.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need
customer_reviews.text: To play the American version or the Chinese. Now, all I need to do is learn how to play either one.The case holds everything together and it looks like a game that will be around several years from now. I can recommend this game set to the Mah Jong beginners like myself or the more advanced player like I hope to become.
customer_reviews.author: William Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great service but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Received game quickly but had a cracked pusher and company quickly replaced it after I sent picture. The second time I used the game the carrying case cracked right at the seam. I had it fixed myself. I did not want to complain a second time. Tiles nice but case and pushers and case need to be of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful quality Maj set
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful quality Maj set. The tiles are heavy and engraved, the racks are colorful and the case is solid. A great set to play with. But...the side of the case is bashed in, and it's too late to return it now that I recycled the packaging. So sad.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Handsome Mah Jongg Set
customer_reviews.text: This MJ set is exactly as shown and described. The case is sturdy for storage or while in the trunk of the car driving to our MJ meeting place. The tiles are clear and distinct. Having the pushers is a great convenience when moving a MJ "wall". Would purchase from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarasota Val

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: This set came with everything you need for a very reasonable price. The tiles are a good weight and color
customer_reviews.author: Noelyn25

customer_reviews.title: they are perfect and the lightweight case protects the lovely tiles and ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered several of these sets for a new MAH JONGG CLUB, they are perfect and the lightweight case protects the lovely tiles and is easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: June Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Love MahJong!
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted to play this for years and finally found 11 others in a wonderful group. I had to have my own set. This is substantial: well made, weighted perfectly, and the carry case is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Aluminum case arrived torn and bent
customer_reviews.text: Arrived double-boxed and neither box was damaged. However, upon opening them, the aluminum case had a tear in the side and one of the rear metal corner reinforcements was bent. The contents inside the case appeared to be undamaged. Entire item was returned for credit.
customer_reviews.author: LindaArtist

customer_reviews.title: Terrific set.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good buy! It is exactly as described. It fits in the case very well. Yes the dice are tiny but .... they work! Love the pushers. When I become an expert at the game I might consider an upgrade meanwhile it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: NormaS

customer_reviews.title: The perfect set
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I was looking for. It was like the one I learned on and was pleasantly surprised when mine came. It came with the pushers which was great. Some I saw were not included with the set. Very Pleased
customer_reviews.author: Sue Brekke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: beautiful set!!Better than i expected!!comes with everything it says!! the case is beautiful and durable .Love this set!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiles are too pale in color
customer_reviews.text: Case and pushers were great. Tiles are lacking some brighter color but I realize it wasn't an expensive set. If they have better tiles you can purchase separetly I might be interested.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Olseth

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Game Set
customer_reviews.text: I just received my new Mahjongg game set and it is beautiful!! The item was very well packed and all pieces are perfect. Played my first game and even though I didn't win, my game looked beautiful. ;0)
customer_reviews.author: slim11361

customer_reviews.title: A very good deal. Everything is stored neatly in the case ...
customer_reviews.text: A very good deal. Everything is stored neatly in the case and the tiles look just like ones that I play with from more expensive sets.
customer_reviews.author: happygirl

customer_reviews.title: Lost and Found
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this set for me since I recently lost a beautiful one, which he got for me as a birthday present. I was really upset about the loss. So, for my most recent birthday, he surprised me with another set. How's that for a great husband?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best set in my opinion and it is definitely worth ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best set in my opinion and it is definitely worth the price. I bought it when I was a beginner taking lessons. The racks, the pushers, the tiles and 2 small dice all fit into the box and still leaves room for the Mah-Jongg card which you will need to purchase separately.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok for money?
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the pushers ends were broken off, replacement case is different and set was missing dice....will just buy some (the ones that come with set are tiny)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Everything comes with the set and it's packaged in a nice case to keep everything from breaking. The only down side is that the case might be a little heavy for someone who is carrying other things or is a little frail.
customer_reviews.author: Joan McLeod

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this product it was just what I wanted. It arrived in very good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Sally J Denton

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: It looks like this game will last a life time. I use it every week and enjoy it. Perhaps there could be a better way to secure the extra tiles. I have them in a draw string bag. But it would be nice if they had a niche of their own.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Set
customer_reviews.text: Love my new Mah Jongg set. Bought this second set for up north and couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Clerico

customer_reviews.title: It is an OK set.
customer_reviews.text: I give it 4 stars because of the case which protects the mahjong. Tile size is smaller than what I used to play with. The 2 containers for the tiles are not well made. Once, you remove the cardboard, there is some space inside the case and this will make the tiles fall off the containers. It would have been great if everything fits snuglly inside the case so that the contents will not shift and tiles won't fall of the 2 containers. Aside from that...it is good set.
customer_reviews.author: Punky

customer_reviews.title: beautiful set.
customer_reviews.text: This is a must for avid Mah Jongg players and a beautiful set. I would buy dice to go with it though, the ones supplied are very tiny
customer_reviews.author: Robyn R Brady

customer_reviews.title: it was perfect.
customer_reviews.text: All of the product came in one piece, not broken or cracked. Decent packaging, could have used a smaller box or more filling. Otherwise, as a Christmas gift, it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: MahJong Lover
customer_reviews.text: This set has everything you need to enjoy the game!If you are a beginner or a pro, this is the set for you!
customer_reviews.author: jenny m

customer_reviews.title: Love the silver case
customer_reviews.text: So excited that my Mah-Jongg game was delivered yesterday. I have been playing for years and finally purchased my own game. Love the silver case! Everything fits into the box, pushers and all. Can't wait to unwrap the tiles and play! My granddaughter wants to learn to play too! After much thought, I know I chose the right set.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kowalski

customer_reviews.title: Mah-Jongg Tiles Set is Great
customer_reviews.text: Price was right. Set looks great. Delivery was quick. However, my instructor where I am taking lessons says the instructions which came with the set should be discarded because they aren't entirely correct and need to be revised.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy F.

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good set for anyone learning to play Mah Jongg
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good set for anyone learning to play Mah Jongg. The tiles are a nice size and very easy to read. The case is sturdy - it would travel well. A short booklet of instructions comes with it. This didn't impress me so I also ordered the American Mah Jongg book which I found very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Suze

customer_reviews.title: The set looks well made and I would have given it an excellent review except for this
customer_reviews.text: this set was given as a gift. It was just opened today. When it was opened it was discovered that the carrying case was broken. Normally I would have no issue. I would just contact the seller for a replacement. However in this case the button wasnt even available. The set looks well made and I would have given it an excellent review except for this.
customer_reviews.author: G. O'Keefe

customer_reviews.title: Damaged on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: Case arrived broken. The contents look very nice, tiles just the size I want. I returned the product and have another on order.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check your tiles!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set but has tiles missing. Very disappointed to have to make "fakes" so we could play on the first day. Unfortunately it was a gift and I was embarrassed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: This set was not only very nice, it had everything I needed plus some extras
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time today. I am a beginner and wasn't sure what I needed. This set was not only very nice, it had everything I needed plus some extras. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Allen

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied. Would
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. Would, however, like to replace the plastic covers for the tile trays, as well as one of the rubber pegs on the tray. Just don't know where to find those items.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Mattson

customer_reviews.title: great bargain!
customer_reviews.text: A couple of my mahjong friends were so impressed they bought them also. This arrived just a few days after I ordered it. At first I thought that I was missing the pushers, but I just missed them in the packing materials.
customer_reviews.author: Reba A

customer_reviews.title: Best deal!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a birthday present for a long time mahjong player based on great reviews from other buyers. The set arrived on time in perfect condition and included everything you need to play tha game. It even included accssory items like pushers which aren't necessary, but nice that many other sets do not include. Tiles were full sized and easy to handle. A great set from a great seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Maj set for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Three of us have now purchased the same set because of the quality and value. Well-constructed case, engraved tiles, brightly colored racks and pushers included. Love the set and would recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: C.  Brault

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An awesome set for the price. Thank you for the offer. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David McDauel

customer_reviews.title: Ready, set, go
customer_reviews.text: complete set. easy to use.I like that it comes with pushers, which often are sold seperately. it is the prefered set over my friends,set. I would reccomend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: Great set with pushers and covered tile boxes
customer_reviews.text: I researched every mah jongg set i found online before purchasing this one. For the money this one has it all: clearly printed tiles, a covered box for tiles, racks with pushers, with plenty of extra flowers, jokers, and blanks to replace any you might misplace, all in a sturdy travel case. A note to the first time adult mah jongg set purchaser: Skip the $20. to $40. travel set and buy this one. It'll save you in the long run; if you like the game enough to purchase a set, you've got the bug and will want a "real" set in the near future. This set is more travel ready than the cardboard box set!
customer_reviews.author: Jasona R. Compton

customer_reviews.title: This MahJongg set with colorful pushers is in a sturdy, attractive case with extra tiles and a die.
customer_reviews.text: This MahJongg set came with extra tiles and a die!! It is in a very sturdy, compact case. It would make a great gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Rundle

customer_reviews.title: Best low cost set around
customer_reviews.text: The tiles on this set feel very heavy, have a lovely finish, and very, very clear markings. The racks are very ordinary but work fine. The dice are tiny (as in most sets) and the case is a sturdy and pretty aluminum. It is not too heavy. The only possible objection that someone (not me) might have is that the trays for storing the tiles are thin plastic. Mine have not cracked or broken but they are clearly weak. It is probable that they were so designed to avoid adding weight to the set. All the weight is in the right place - the beautiful tiles!
customer_reviews.author: ice queen who

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner set!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality when compared to many others. You still get the feeling its very much a plastic set. Great beginner set!
customer_reviews.author: R. Swenson

customer_reviews.title: altogether I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: the set was ok except it had been dropped in transit. The case has a dent and a slight separation at the end . altogether I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Mahjong Set !
customer_reviews.text: This set is exactly what I wanted --- nice tiles (extra also given); great quality racks AND pushers. Basic instruction book included. Case is good and lightweight. Would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: ebsbooker

customer_reviews.title: Great mah-jongg set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic set. It arrived quickly, it is beautifully made, and everything fits well in the case. I'm glad I bought the set with the pushers. Pushers make it easier to move your wall. You won't go wrong with this set.
customer_reviews.author: JoyFace

They will give your whole set the best protection for years to come. *An instruction manual that will help everybody to learn how to play
